text: Ajay Dey is an Indian politician who has been involved in the politics of the All India Trinamool Congress. Earlier he was a politician from Indian National Congress. From 1991 to 2016, he was the MLA for the Shantipur Assembly constituency in the West Bengal Legislative Assembly. == References == == External links == *West Bengal Legislative Assembly Category:Members of the West Bengal Legislative Assembly Category:Living people Category:Indian National Congress politicians Category:All India Trinamool Congress politicians from West Bengal Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Ajoy Dey
